metadata.title: CVE-2016-2816 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Mozilla Firefox before 46.0 allows remote attackers to bypass the ContentSecurity Policy (CSP) protection mechanism via themultipart/x-mixed-replace content type.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
